sentences.en: A chorus of voices greet this with assent.
sentences.cn: 众人异口同声表示赞成.

sentences.en: An unerringly professional team greet and treat clients.
sentences.cn: 完美的职业团队迎接并善待客户。

sentences.en: Complete silence greeted us as we entered the room.
sentences.cn: 走进房间，迎接我们的是一片沉默。

sentences.en: He put his hand familiarly on her shoulder, as if only to greet her in passing.
sentences.cn: 他亲密地把他的手搭在她肩上, 好像只是路过打个招呼.

sentences.en: His statement was greeted with cries of astonishment and indignation.
sentences.cn: 他的这番话被报以一片叫喊声，有震惊，也有愤怒。

sentences.en: I hate to greet the committee with bad news, but it can't be helped.
sentences.cn: 我不愿让委员会听到坏消息, 但这是无可奈何的事.

sentences.en: On all sides , verdant sunset - bathed hills greet the eye.
She liked to be home to greet Steve when he came in from school.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢呆在家里迎接放学回家的史蒂夫。

sentences.en: She rose to greet her guests.
Sister - in - law told Hai - erh to greet me and wish me good morning.
sentences.cn: 她说了又叫海儿给我请安.

sentences.en: Sumner would greet us with frowns and grimaces, doing his best to express wordless disapproval.
sentences.cn: 萨姆纳会冲我们皱眉，做苦脸，竭力表示他无言的反对。

sentences.en: The child is shy and doesn't like to greet people.
They hastened to greet him and asked urgently, "Did you find it?"
sentences.cn: 他们赶忙去迎他，急切地问，“找到了吗？”

sentences.en: We've come to see you, so you could at least stand and greet us properly.
sentences.cn: 我们都来看你了，你至少应该起身得体地打个招呼。

sentences.en: Xiangzi wished to smooth things over and greet her as usual , but found he really couldn't.
sentences.cn: 祥子打算合合稀泥,把长脸一拉, 招呼她一声.

sentences.en: You are very good to greet me in this public fashion.
sentences.cn: 你心眼儿好,能在这样的公共场面和我打招呼.

sentences.en: You needn't worry; I'll be ready to greet them. Meanwhile I'm off to discuss the Fowler's party with Felix.
sentences.cn: 你不必担心，我会招呼他们的。其间，我还要去跟费利克斯商量一下福勒举办聚会的事。

words.tran_cn: （在酒店、超市等门口迎接顾客的）接待员

trans.tran_cn: 同…打招呼，对…作出反应，呈现在…面前，迎接，传入...鼻中
trans.tran_en: to say hello to someone or welcome them
to say hello to someone or welcome them
